entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late this evening and overnight. Snow level 1500 metres lowering to valley bottom after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Snow level rising to 1000 metres near noon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low zero with patchy frost. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers early in the evening and risk of a thunderstorm. Clearing near midnight. Snow level 1000 metres. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low zero with patchy frost. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Monday 17 April 2023
